original_text: I will do good things for your people and I will give many children to them. Their number will grow. I will do everything that I have promised to do for them.
korean_text: 내가 너희를 돌보아 너희를 번성하게 하고 너희를 창대하게 할 것이며 내가 너희와 함께 한 내 언약을 이행하리라

sentences.original_text: I will do good things for your people
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 네 백성에게 좋은 것을 행하리라

sentences.original_text: and I will give many children to them
that I have promised to do for them
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 그들에게 행하기로 약속한 모든 것을
